description.ko: 자연이 빛과 코드라는 매체를 통해 피어나는, 생물학과 정보의 교차점입니다.
description.en: The intersection of biology and information, where nature blooms through the medium of light and code.

prompt: A hyper-realistic macro shot of FLORA-9, a dandelion where each seed is a glowing #89CFF0 fiber-optic packet. The stem is composed of translucent #50C878 emerald circuit boards pulsing with liquid data. As the seeds detach, they transform into #FFB6C1 fractal petals floating in a soft-focus bokeh of binary code. Set against a dark #4A0E4E velvet background, featuring iridescent liquid mercury droplets on leaves. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, digital nature aesthetic.
